name: funniSquareGame
description:
You're a Square, you have no other meaning.

Your goal is to be the best square ever, but its not that easy....

How to move?

Well, it depends on the game mode you're playing on so just open the TUTORIAL.md file for more info. (Right now there's only one gamemode so... just use the left and right arrows lol)

----------------------------------------------Versions:

0.1.0 [Previous Version] => Prototype / early Alpha, only one gamemode. Almost nothing special.

0.2.0 (Current Version) => This update mainly focused on making the game look better.  You can call it the "Design Update".

----------------------------------------------

What's new? (Differences from the previous version):

- Added stuff like backgrounds, FX, rotating effect for the falling squares, a new title and more...

- Added a best score counter, need some more fixes but is functioning fine. It saves your score locally so I still need to make the counter save your score even if you're exiting the game, maybe in the next update (0.3.0).

- Added new type of Square: Damage Square (its a red Square that deals damage and lowers your score).

- Added sound effects (and in the next update there'll be music too).

- Added new mechanic that allows you to go through one side of the screen and then teleport on the other side of the screen.

- Changed the title of the game's window.

- Bug fixes (Zero score bug)

- Not a new thing inside the game itself but now you can download the previous versions of the game. I just think its nice lol.

- You can play the game on your browser (although there's a bug that needs to be fixed that crashes the game whenever you click "PLAY" so just don't play in browser rn lol)

and.... that's it basically.

Credits:

Creator: QwertZero

Programmer: QwertZero

Testers: no one at the moment lol

And thank you for playing the game!!

Builds for HTML5, Mac and linux will be in the future!

Stay tuned for more updates, news and other stuff about the game.
